Header: A person dies during religious ceremony at a temple in Ichankulam
Content: A person has drowned while performing a religious offering at the Ichankulam Ganewadevi Kovil in Vavuniya today. It is reported that he had gone to the nearby Thavasiyakulam tank to perform a religious ritual and drowned. The deceased has been identified as a 27 year old resident of Ichchankulam
